rev.title: Revision
rev.description: Fetch specific revision of a document. Defaults to winning revision

revs.title: Revision History
revs.description: Include revision history of the document

revs_info.title: Revision Info
revs_info.description: Include a list of revisions of the document, and their availability

open_revs.title: Open Revision
open_revs.description: Fetch all leaf revisions if open_revs="all" or fetch all leaf revisions specified in open_revs array. Leaves will be returned in the same order as specified in input array.

conflicts.title: Conflicts
conflicts.description: If specified, conflicting leaf revisions will be attached in _conflicts array

local_seq.title: Include sequence number
local_seq.description: Include sequence number of the revision in the database

ajax.title: Ajax
ajax.description: An object of options to be sent to the ajax requester
